oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Andrew Jackson before his troops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Print of Andrew Jackson in military uniform standing before his troops. Jackson holds a bayonet and holds his other hand to his chest. A dark horse is beside him. The troops also have bayonets. One soldier leans forward in the middle of the crowd. Quelling a Mutiny
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845
Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845;Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845. Works. 1986;New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Louisiana--History--War of 1812
